channel.title: I require some assistance
channel.description:
I need some help i just downloaded creative scape because i am interested in it alot but i cant get anything to run. I downaoded a client/server/Cache fille off the topic. i changed the run and compiller to run with my current jdk (jdk1.6.0_17) and as soon as i try to run the command prompts just say they cannot find the specified path. I have encountered this problem before but it usuaily fixes when i change the jdk...
I feel like a newb for asking this question but can someone help me please :)

item.title: I require some assistance
item.dc:creator: @King_Zeus King Zeus
item.description:
@King_Zeus wrote:

I figured it all out with a friend i got the compiler for source running and the client i just had to change my classpath lmfao but NEW PROBLEM
i can get the actuaily source running but when i load the client it just shows an error i will type what it says EXACTLY:

Could not find the main class:Gui. Program will exit

I have tried taking the gui from another source and putting it in but it just took a crap on my face and left it there… I cant get it to work i was SO close Is there a way to get past the GUI or how do i go about making one? PLEASE and TY !

Read full topic

item.title: I require some assistance
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

Have you set your Environment Variables for JDK? If not, refer to the EV Setter which is stickied in the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html]Server Downloads[/url] Section.

Read full topic
